Package ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BogoPicGen
    This class is not really part of the StoryHoard application.
    ChapterManager
    Role: Interacts with the database to store, update, and retrieve chapter chapters.
    ChoiceManager
    Role: Interacts with the database to store, update, and retrieve choice objects.
    DBContract
    Purpose: Defines the tables of the database that will be created for the application.
    DBContract.ChapterTable
    Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing the chapters
    DBContract.ChoiceTable
    Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing the choices
    DBContract.MediaTable
    Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing media (photos/illustrations/audio/video)
    DBContract.StoryTable
    Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing stories.
    DBHelper
    Purpose: Creates and sets up the database to be used using the information about the database provided in the contract class (DbHelper).
    MediaManager
    Role: Interacts with the database to store, update, and retrieve media objects.
    StoringManager<A>
    Interface for storing, updating, and retrieving objects locally (to the database).
    StoryManager
    Role: Interacts with the database to store, update, and retrieve story objects.
    Syncher
    Role: uses all of the manager classes to "sync" stories.
    Utilities
    Class meant for general functions that can be used by any class.
